name: Kuroko no Basket - Kagami-kun and Murasakibara-kun's Worst and Suckiest Day Ever - Mostly Because of Himuro (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Murasakibara x Kagami + Himuro

name: Unmei Ja Nai Hito
nutshell: Omega college student Shizuki Tsugaya feared the worst when he goes into heat while walking down the street and attracts a nearby Alpha, but he is unexpectedly saved - by his own attacker! Shizuki is impressed by the handsome man's ability to fight his instincts and regain his self-control, especially since his own instincts are telling him that this person is his fated pair. When he learns that his new prince charming is the president of a modeling company, Shizuki immediately applies for a job there, determined to be close to him. Can he convince his new employer that the two of them were meant to be together?

name: Persona 4 Comic Anthology (Hinotama)
nutshell:
Collection of short stories based on the Persona 4 game, made by various artists.
Publisher: Hinotama

name: Hitosaki no Hana
nutshell:
A collection of short stories:

Kobore Mono (Things That Drip)
Kimochi Kurabe: Natsu (A Measure of Feelings: Summer)
3-5) Hitosaki no Hana (A Single Bloom)


Oohime
Yoshitaka
Sakura Shibe Furu (Falling Sakura Pistils)

name: Deep Forest
nutshell:
There is a large virtual space called "Deep Forest," where many people travel as avatars.
Origa is a schoolgirl who has become a DF explorer in an effort to discover the reason behind her mother's death.
Luckily, she has a famous hacker on her side as a guide, a monkey avatar called Jr.
Deep Forest is indeed a dangerous place, contested by the company she believes is responsible for that death,
hackers and other shady parties: Origa will have to follow a difficult path for uncovering the truth.

name: The Celestial Returned from Hell
nutshell:
I’ve returned from hell. After enduring for thousands of years, I will be the one to save humanity.


Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>




Official English <PocketComics> Transaltion


Official Japanese Translation

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle- Teitoku ga Kodomo Chinjufu ni Chakuninshimashita (Doujinshi)
I Want to Become the Hero's Bride (￣∇￣)ゞ
nutshell:
"…That person, my fated one."
Everything changed for Berlina, a girl who reincarnated in a fantasy world with memories of her previous life, the moment she laid eyes on the Hero, Chris. She abandoned her life in the city and started a new life of chasing after him! Whether in fire, water, or inside a dangerous dungeon, firmly hiding 10 meters behind the figure of the Hero, to chase and watch over him. All to be his bride!!

name: Pandora Hearts Art Book ~odds and ends~
Venus Wars
nutshell: In the year 2003, a titanic collision between an immense ice asteroid and the planet Venus transforms Earth's closest neighbor into a habitable world. Eighty years later, two colonial powers, Ishtar and Aphrodia, glare at each other across a contested frontier. The militaristic Ishtar, hungry for Aphrodia's rich resources, has developed a supertank known as the Octopus to spearhead its assault force. Unable to face Ishtar's industrial might head on, Aphrodia counters with the Hound–a high-performance antitank battle cycle designed to outmaneuver the massive tanks and strike their weak points. The war won't wait and the fate of all Aphrodia is in the hands of Ken Falkirk, a suicidal motorcycle daredevil!

name: This Office Lady Wants To Be Healed
nutshell:
Satoko needs some healing… and who better to help her than her co-worker?
Creator-approved translation by TheElusiveTaco.

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle-  Everyday YuuShigu (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Part of the Kantai Collection franchise.
A doujinshi series by Jako of circle chirimenjako in the 4koma format. It depicts the everyday life of destroyers Yuudachi and Shigure, as well as their sister ships of the Shiratsuyu class, with guest appearances from others in the fleet as well as the Admiral himself.

name: Steel Rain
nutshell:
N. Korea leader Kim Jong Il is dead ! And a coup occurs within N. Korea. USA has been waiting for this moment… It's time to get rid of little menace. S. Korea gets entangled in this affair of course. Will Korea be united? Or is there more than what meets the eyes?
This webtoon was drawn when Kim Jong-Il was still alive.

name: Mahou Kabushikigaisha
nutshell:
Kanako likes magic, and her dream to work in the country's largest Magic Company is fulfilled. However, the department she is in has almost nothing to do with the main branch because the Second Research class consists of no one but a bunch of slackers. In order to make their name sound, Kanaka tried her best to encourage her teammates to produce new magic items and to help them while improving her own magic skills.
Wikipedia
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon

name: 100 Man-kai no Suki o Ageru
nutshell: During a tournament in middle school, Rui fell in love at first sight with Youhei from the basketball club. I loved, loved, loved him, chasing after Youhei until we finally became lovers. Although we became separated in high school, I would die if it were for Youhei. I was happy as long as they were together…. Or so I thought. I had to study properly and think seriously about my career, but my greedy feelings overflowed and ahhh, the brakes won't work anymore!!

name: The Last Will of a Crush
tags: Psychological,Long Strip,Romance,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Mystery,Full Color,Tragedy
nutshell:
Mingyeol is a happy-go-lucky twenty-six-year-old girl who recently quit her job. With extra time on her hands, she spends her days crushing on Tae-eun, a cute boy who works at her favorite coffee shop owned by Tae-eun’s older sister Huiyeon. Mingyeol stops by every day despite Tae-eun’s lukewarm reactions. What seems like a lucky break finally arrives when he asks for a favor. He hands her a letter, asking her to give it to Huiyeon a week later. Though puzzled, Mingyeol is willing to cooperate, but her own sister tactlessly opens the letter and announces the alarming news: it’s a will! When Mingyeol confronts Tae-eun, he acts like he doesn’t remember anything at all. Mingyeol is now armed with a mission to save her crush, but will he open up to her and tell her what’s wrong?



Official Simplified Chinese Translation


Official Japanese Translation

name: Ao ni, Fureru.
nutshell:
Ruriko Aoyama is a high school girl with a blue bruise called Nevus of Ota on her face. She has learned to live without worrying about the bruise. That way others won't pay that much attention to it.
Ruriko meets Kanda, the new homeroom teacher at her school, but one day when seeing Kanda's notes Ruriko notices that the notebook of her classmate is heavily written while hers is empty, so she goes to question Kanda.
However, Kanda suffers from Prosopagnosia, also called face blindness, a cognitive disorder of face perception that impairs the ability to recognize familiar faces, including one's own...

name: Joshikai Quest
nutshell: Her body clad in armor, the girl's name was Chloé, the legendary imperial knight. She, whose role is to protect the king from countless enemies, attended the G8 and is going to open an unexpected door!! (from MangaUpdates)

name: Manga Introduction to the World Economy
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Kenta Igashima of the Coordination Division of the Economic Planning Agency flies around the world to witness global-scale problems!　ODA, or Official Development Assistance, is one of Japan's largest foreign policy areas, but does Japan really understand its donor countries? This book provides an easy-to-understand explanation of the current situation in which Japan is under pressure to review its assistance as environmental and population issues come to the surface. Other topics include problems in Eastern Europe and global environmental issues, in a four-part series of one-episode readings. A very popular series following Introduction to the Japanese Economy!

name: Koi no Mimi Yori Chuuihou
nutshell: Hajime can't wait to make the scene at his high school… but his dreams of coolness are soon dashed by the appearance of the weird and wily Nagura!

name: Bad Plan
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,Office Workers,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Lee Joo-hyuk (the team leader) doesn’t understand why his subordinate Park Hwi-rim is only very cold and stiff with him whereas he has good interpersonal relationships with the rest of his colleagues….getting furious, Joo-hyuk decides to approach Hwi-rim with a wicked plan !!

name: Hai Shinigami to Fushi no Neko
nutshell: The maritime nation "Republic of Enetia" where the plague "black disease" has begun to spread. In this country, there was a "state affairs assassin" who executed a felony, commonly known as an assassin of justice.

name: A Trip to the Beauty Salon
Koi ga Ochitara
nutshell:
One night, right after he was dumped by his boyfriend, a pair of underwear came falling down upon Ise's head. The one who dropped it was a man named Hishimoto, whom Ise couldn't seem to ignore – and they end up working together to bring in the laundry that had fallen onto a tree outside his window.
After being told by Hishimoto that he would like to thank him, Ise goes up to his place. There, he is told that Hishimoto has been thinking about him, and that he had used the fallen laundry as an excuse!

name: Sakanaya Champion
nutshell: Serialized in 1962 but volume was not available until 1977. Won 3rd Kodansha Children's Manga Award.

name: Mori no Koe
nutshell:
Otoyami no Mori - Yume no Koe
While visiting the market one day, Doctor Ao happens upon a stand where they're selling demons and reluctantly purchases one as his own. Although the demon has been treated harshly in the past, he meets kindness at his new master's hands and comes to find peace with him. But when that peace is threatened can they find their way back to each other?! Or will the demon disappear for good?!


Yumeoi no Mori
A wounded professor awakes to find himself in the capture of a young demon.


Itsuwari no Mori
Yuusa is the neglected only child of a wealthy woman, and the only kindness he received as a child was from one of her pet demons, Hugh. Yuusa's all grown up now, and can't understand Hugh's coldness towards him, so he often abuses Hugh to get his attention. But Yuusa's manipulation's go too far…


Yoru Utau Mori
Continuation story about the characters from Yumeoi no Mori.


Mori ni Shizumu Tsuki
Continuation story about the characters from Itsuwari no Mori.

name: Hontoni, Yasashii
nutshell:
From modern-day tales of romance in Seattle, to eerie stories from historical Japan, to Yoshinaga-sensei's depiction of the class conflicts that fueled the French Revolution…
And perhaps best of all, the characters Claude and Antoine (a young aristocrat and his butler) are introduced in this volume. Catch up to their later adventures in Fumi Yoshinaga's "Lovers in the Night"!

name: Rumble Rush
nutshell:
Rumble Rush
New worker at the train station, in a desperate situation being played with by a groper. A groper, who targets only young men during rush hours, appears! And… the new staff at the train station Akiyama, who by orders to become the bait for the groper, gets to experience the attack of the pervert finger…!!


Dr. H!


High School Maze


Roar of the Sea (Shiosai)
Hirofumi returns home when his father dies. Will he meet his high school friend Jin who confessed to him when they were teenagers and was part of the reason Hirofumi hasn't returned home for 15 years?


Stay


After the Rain

name: Masterpiece Illustrated Children's Tales
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
This is a rare and valuable compilation of picture books published as "Shotaro Ishimori's Masterpiece Picture Tales" series volume 1-6 (published by Hikari no Kuni): "Treasure Island", "20,000 Leagues Under the Sea", "The Little Match Girl", "The Three Musketeers", "Lobo, the King of Currumpaw", and "The War of the Worlds". The stories are all written in hiragana for young children, but the bold and lively spreads, typical of Shotaro Ishinomori, are a masterpiece! The end of the book contains the unfinished manuscript of "The Little Mermaid," the seventh book in the series!

name: Pika Pika Days
nutshell:
1-3. Shining Days
The strong-willed Asahi and the easy-going Tetsuro have been close friends since kids. Now in high school, those two still “share” their bento. However, Asahi is asked to stop bullying Tetsuro, “because he’s too nice to tell you his true feelings!” But is that really how Tetsuro feels about Asahi’s bullying—?


Fireworks
Morio invite Saeki to the local fireworks festival but receives the usual cold response from Saeki. Follows Morio and Saeki-sensei from Vanilla.


Anniversary
Nakajima is unsure about his relationship status with Yajima, They have been going out for weeks but nothing physical has yet to happen between them. Follows Nakajima and Yajima from Vanilla.



Lost Pain
Nakajima is unsure of Yajima's love for him despite the constant declarations of love. The problem? Nakajima finds it hard to take Yajima seriously when all he can see is his poker face. Follows Nakajima and Yajima from Vanilla.



The Prince's Secret
The prince admits his past history to his lover, hoping he will display some signs of jealousy. The sequel to Hashire! Oujisama. Scanlated by Obsession as DJ for Hashire! Oujisama.


The Standard Equation of Love
A friend confesses to stealing his girlfriend to his childhood playmate, hoping to get a rise out of him.

name: Kanojo ga Kare ni Ochiru Riyuu
nutshell:
Kare ga Kanojo ni Ochiru Riyuu
After school, being hit upon by a younger, obnoxious man.
…But, somehow, when alone with him, I easily become nervous.
What if, such a kouhai suddenly kisses–?
"It's frustrating to find myself falling in love with you"
"That's just useless struggling"


Amekakure no Kaerimichi
Tachibana Mitsu loves umbrellas and the rain. Whereas, Sugisaki is popular, loves sports and summer. They couldn't be any more different, their similarity only lies to sitting in class next to each other, however, they may have one thing that they have on common…


Satou to Bitter Chocolate
Hana just gave chocolates to the boy she likes Takuto. Little does she know that he is soon to be her brother! What will Hana do? Will she still continue loving him?


Seinaru Yoruni Oshiete Ageru
